thread.title: U.S., Britain Issue Warnings Over Chinese Telecom Equipment Maker ZTE

author: Jason Douglas
title: U.S., Britain Issue Warnings Over Chinese Telecom Equipment Maker ZTE

organizations.name: britain issue warnings over chinese telecom equipment

text:
U.S. and British officials struck separate blows at telecommunications-equipment giant ZTE Corp., ratcheting up national-security scrutiny of a big Chinese company amid broader economic tensions between Washington and Beijing. 

British cybersecurity officials warned U.K. phone carriers to stay clear of ZTEâ€™s equipment and services, citing concern about the potential that Beijing could force the company to help it infiltrate or sabotage telecoms infrastructure. The U.S. Commerce Department, separately, banned American companies...
